message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CV (Computer Vision) - The paper focuses on addressee recognition in visual scenes, which involves analyzing images and identifying people in them. This falls under the domain of computer vision. 
2. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper also deals with analyzing transcripts of utterances to predict the addressee. This involves natural language processing and falls under the domain of computation and language. 
3. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) - The paper proposes a deep learning-based model for addressee recognition, which falls under the domain of artificial intelligence. 
4. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) - The paper discusses the importance of addressee recognition in human-computer interaction, which falls under the domain of human-computer interaction. 
5. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a machine learning-based model for addressee recognition, which falls under the domain of machine learning.
